item.title: Kleiner Perkins-backed voice AI startup Keplar aims to replace traditional market research

item.title: China tells its tech companies they can’t buy AI chips from Nivida
item.description: After strongly discouraging tech companies from buying Nivdia's AI chips in August, the country is now banning the practice outright.
